price: 129. Sidaasaan ugu salladnaa daalimiinta qaarkoodba qaarka kale, waxay kasbadeen awgeed (oo denbiyo ah).
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
